inbox.emptyDescription: Connect with friends to start sharing sessions

connect.invalidSecretKey: Invalid secret key. Please check and try again.

settings.title: Settings
settings.aboutFooter: Happy Coder is a Codex and Claude Code mobile client. It's fully end-to-end encrypted and your account is stored only on your device. Not affiliated with Anthropic.
settings.whatsNewSubtitle: See the latest updates and improvements
settings.usageSubtitle: View your API usage and costs

settingsAppearance.inlineToolCallsDescription: Display tool calls directly in chat messages
settingsAppearance.expandTodoListsDescription: Show all todos instead of just changes
settingsAppearance.showLineNumbersInDiffsDescription: Display line numbers in code diffs
settingsAppearance.showLineNumbersInToolViews: Show Line Numbers in Tool Views
settingsAppearance.showLineNumbersInToolViewsDescription: Display line numbers in tool view diffs
settingsAppearance.wrapLinesInDiffsDescription: Wrap long lines instead of horizontal scrolling in diff views
settingsAppearance.alwaysShowContextSizeDescription: Display context usage even when not near limit
settingsAppearance.showFlavorIconsDescription: Display AI provider icons on session avatars
settingsAppearance.compactSessionViewDescription: Show active sessions in a more compact layout

settingsFeatures.experimentsDescription: Enable experimental features that are still in development. These features may be unstable or change without notice.
settingsFeatures.webFeaturesDescription: Features available only in the web version of the app.
settingsFeatures.hideInactiveSessionsSubtitle: Show only active chats in your list
settingsFeatures.groupSessionsByProjectSubtitle: Group past sessions by their working directory
settingsFeatures.notificationsDescription: Configure how you receive alerts about your sessions.

errors.contactSupport: Contact support if the problem persists
errors.oauthStateMismatch: Security validation failed. Please try again
errors.sessionDeletedDescription: This session has been permanently removed
errors.messagesLoadingTimeout: Messages are taking longer than usual to load
errors.retryIn: Retry in {seconds} second | Retry in {seconds} seconds
errors.connectServiceFailed: Failed to connect {service}. Please try again.
errors.claudeTokenExpired: Claude authentication expired. Please reconnect your account.
errors.claudeNotConnected: Claude account not connected. Go to Settings to connect.
errors.claudeTokenRefreshFailed: Failed to refresh Claude token. Please reconnect your account.
errors.claudeApiError: Claude API request failed. Please try again.

newSession.title: Start New Session
newSession.noMachinesFound: No machines found. Start a Happy session on your computer first.
newSession.createDirectoryConfirm: The directory {directory} does not exist. Do you want to create it?
newSession.sessionStartedMessage: The session has been started successfully.
newSession.sessionSpawningFailed: Session spawning failed - no session ID returned.
newSession.failedToStart: Failed to start session. Make sure the daemon is running on the target machine.
newSession.sessionTimeout: Session startup timed out. The machine may be slow or the daemon may not be responding.
newSession.notConnectedToServer: Not connected to server. Check your internet connection.
newSession.noMachineSelected: Please select a machine to start the session
newSession.noPathSelected: Please select a directory to start the session in
newSession.sessionStartingSlow: Session is starting slowly. It will appear in your sessions list once ready. You may need to send your prompt again.
newSession.sessionStartFailed: Session failed to start. The daemon may not have responded in time. Please check CLI logs and try again.

sessionHistory.title: Session History
sessionHistory.resumeDescription: This will create a new session with the full conversation history from the original. The original session will remain unchanged.
sessionHistory.resumeRequiresMachine: Machine must be online to resume
sessionHistory.resumeClaudeOnly: Resume is only available for Claude sessions

revival.revivingDescription: Your session stopped unexpectedly. Attempting to restore it now.
revival.failedDescription: The session stopped and could not be revived automatically.

server.advancedFeatureFooter: This is an advanced feature. Only change the server if you know what you're doing. You will need to log out and log in again after changing servers.
server.invalidJsonResponse: Server response is not valid JSON. Make sure the URL points to a Happy Server API, not a web page.
server.missingRequiredFields: Server response is missing required fields: {fields}
server.incompatibleVersion: Server version {serverVersion} is not compatible. Minimum required version is {requiredVersion}.

sessionRevival.revivingDescription: Your session stopped unexpectedly. Attempting to restore.
sessionRevival.failedDescription: The session stopped and could not be revived automatically.
sessionRevival.unknownError: An unknown error occurred during revival

allowedCommands.securityNote: Commands not on this list are blocked for security

artifacts.title: Artifacts
artifacts.emptyDescription: Create your first artifact to get started
artifacts.updateError: Failed to update artifact. Please try again.
artifacts.discardChangesDescription: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to discard them?
artifacts.titlePlaceholder: Enter a title for your artifact
artifacts.emptyFieldsError: Please enter a title or content
artifacts.createError: Failed to create artifact. Please try again.

bulkRestore.timeoutWarning: Timed out — session may have been restored. Try refreshing.
bulkRestore.revivalIssues: {count} session stopped unexpectedly. Check details for more info. | {count} sessions stopped unexpectedly. Check details for more info.

permissions.yesAllowAllEdits: Yes, allow all edits during this session
permissions.yesForTool: Yes, don't ask again for this tool
permissions.noTellClaude: No, and tell Claude what to do differently

permissions.yesForSession: Yes, and don't ask for a session
permissions.stopAndExplain: Stop, and explain what to do

emptyMainScreen.welcomeSubtitle: Control Claude Code from your phone with end-to-end encryption

onboarding.welcomeDescription: Control Claude Code and Codex from anywhere with your phone
onboarding.scanDescription: Scan a QR code from your terminal to instantly connect with end-to-end encryption
onboarding.controlDescription: Approve permissions, send messages, and monitor your AI sessions in real-time
onboarding.voiceDescription: Talk to Claude and get instant audio responses while your hands stay on the keyboard
onboarding.startDescription: Connect your first terminal and start coding with AI assistance

planLimits.title: Plan usage limits
planLimits.unavailable: Usage limits are not available for your current provider

review.feedbackPrompt: We'd love to hear your feedback!

settingsAccount.linkNewDeviceSubtitle: Scan QR code to link device
settingsAccount.name: Name
settingsAccount.backupDescription: Your secret key is the only way to recover your account. Save it in a secure place like a password manager.
settingsAccount.secretKeyCopied: Secret key copied to clipboard. Store it in a safe place!
settingsAccount.privacyDescription: Control your visibility and data sharing preferences.
settingsAccount.showOnlineStatusDisabled: You appear offline to all friends
settingsAccount.logoutSubtitle: Sign out and clear local data
settingsAccount.logoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to logout? Make sure you have backed up your secret key!

settingsLanguage.title: Language
settingsLanguage.description: Choose your preferred language for the app interface. This will sync across all your devices.
settingsLanguage.needsRestartMessage: The app needs to restart to apply the new language setting.

settingsMcp.title: MCP Servers
settingsMcp.noMachinesDescription: Connect to a CLI machine to view MCP server configuration.
settingsMcp.noOnlineMachinesDescription: Your connected machines are currently offline. MCP configuration will appear when they come online.
settingsMcp.noServersDescription: No MCP servers are configured on the connected CLI.
settingsMcp.addServerHint: Run this command on your CLI to add a server
settingsMcp.readOnlyNote: MCP configuration is read-only. Use the CLI to add, remove, or modify servers.
settingsMcp.serverNotFoundDescription: This MCP server is no longer available. It may have been removed or the machine is offline.
settingsMcp.noToolsDescription: Tool details are not yet available for this server.
settingsMcp.toolsReadOnlyNote: Tool configuration is read-only. Use the CLI to enable or disable tools.

settingsVoice.languageDescription: Choose your preferred language for voice assistant interactions. This setting syncs across all your devices.
settingsVoice.preferredLanguageSubtitle: Language used for voice assistant responses

accessStatus.title: Voice Access
accessStatus.description: Your current voice assistant subscription status.
accessStatus.upgradePrompt: Upgrade to Pro to unlock voice assistant features.

settingsNotifications.title: Notifications
settingsNotifications.alertsDescription: Choose how you want to be notified.
settingsNotifications.enableDescription: Turn all notifications on or off.
settingsNotifications.messagesDescription: Notify me when new messages arrive.
settingsNotifications.sessionActivityDescription: Get notified when a session changes state.
settingsNotifications.machineStatusDescription: Alerts when machines connect or disconnect.
settingsNotifications.soundsDescription: Play a sound when alerts arrive.

swipeActions.replyHint: Navigate to session to send a message

terminal.webBrowserRequiredDescription: Terminal connection links can only be opened in a web browser for security reasons. Please use the QR code scanner or open this link on a computer.
terminal.invalidConnectionLinkDescription: The connection link is missing or invalid. Please check the URL and try again.
terminal.terminalRequestDescription: A terminal is requesting to connect to your Happy Coder account. This will allow the terminal to send and receive messages securely.
terminal.securityFooter: This connection link was processed securely in your browser and was never sent to any server. Your private data will remain secure and only you can decrypt the messages.
terminal.securityFooterDevice: This connection was processed securely on your device and was never sent to any server. Your private data will remain secure and only you can decrypt the messages.
